about_the_game:
Re:ZERO heroes & heroines have arrived in the world of DFO!
Get Re:ZERO themed Avatars + adorable Skill Cutscene for limited time only!

Package Contents
1) Re:ZERO Full Set Avatar Box (Untradable)
  • Bind to Account
  • Contains 8 pieces of untradable Re:ZERO Avatars of your class choice.

2) Re:ZERO Cutscene Box
  • Bind to Account
  • Contains a Re:ZERO Skill Cutscene of your choice.
  • 4 different types of Cutscenes are available (Rem, Ram, Emilia, Beatrice).

Container boxes expires on NOV 5 so please make sure to use it before it expires!

* Please Note :
  • Re:ZERO Steam DLC is only available before OCT 22, 2019.
  • Steam DLC Redeem UI screen is located under main menu. You must manually redeem purchased DLC in game.

Get Re:ZERO themed Avatars + adorable Skill Cutscene for limited time only!

Package Contents

2) Re:ZERO Cutscene Box

Container boxes expires on NOV 5 so please make sure to use it before it expires!

* Please Note :

name: Dungeon Fighter Online: Re:ZERO Steam DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7 32bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E7500
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: HDD space: 18GB HDD space before installation, 10GB HDD space after installation / Browser: Microsoft Internet Explorer 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7 64bit and higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E7500 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 512MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: HDD space: 18GB HDD space before installation, 10GB HDD space after installation / Browser: Microsoft Internet Explorer 10 or higher

short_description: Re:Zero heroes & heroines have arrived in the world of DFO! Get Re:Zero themed Avatars + adorable Skill Cutscene for limited time only!
